title: Figs With Marcona Almonds, Aged Goat Cheese, and Hot Honey Recipe
full_text:
Figs With Marcona Almonds, Aged Goat Cheese, and Hot Honey Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
12
ounces
best-quality ripe
figs
, split in half
3
ounces
aged
goat cheese
, such as
crottin
, torn into small pieces
1
cup whole kernels
small handful
marcona almonds
, split with a knife
1 to
2
tablespoons
picked small
thyme
leaves or torn basil leaves
1/4
tsp
flaky
sea salt
, such as Maldon
1
tablespoon
extra virgin olive oil
, for drizzling
1
tbsp
Mike's Hot Honey
or regular
honey
Directions
Arrange figs, goat cheese, almonds, and basil or thyme leaves on a serving platter. Sprinkle lightly with flaky sea salt and drizzle with olive oil and honey. Serve.
